extension.dc:title: Taxon Description
extension.name: Description
extension.dc:subject: dwc:Taxon checklist
extension.dc:description: DwC Taxon extension to exchange simple text/paragraph based taxon descriptions. Not suitable for structured descriptions and keys, but useful for creating species pages.

property.name: description
property.dc:description: Any descriptive free text matching the category given as dc:type. The text should be either plain text or formatted with basic html tags, i.e. h1-4,p,i,b,a,img,ul and li. All other tags should be removed.

property.name: source
property.dc:description: Source reference of this description, a URL or full publication citation

property.name: references
property.dc:description: A URL to a related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource. Often another webpage showing the same, but richer resource see also http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/index.htm#dcterms:references

property.name: language
property.dc:description: ISO 639-1 language code used for the vernacular name value.

property.name: created
property.dc:description: The date and time this description was written or last updated

property.name: creator
property.dc:description: The author(s) of the textual information provided for a description

property.name: contributor
property.dc:description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the textual information provided for a description

property.name: audience
property.dc:description: A class or description for whom the dwc:description is intended or useful

property.name: license
property.dc:description: Official permission to do something with the resource. Please use Creative Commons URIs if you can.

property.name: modified
property.dc:description: The date and time this description was written or last modified

property.name: rightsHolder
property.dc:description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the description.

property.name: accessRights
property.dc:description: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

property.name: rights
property.dc:description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
